activity.title: World Intellectual Property Organization
activity.description: The World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO) is one of the 16 specialized agencies of the United Nations system of organisations. Its role is administrating 23 international treates dealing with different aspects of limited monopolies on knowledge. As an observer to WIPO and together with a global coalition of other players with similar goals, FSFE worked towards reshaping it as a "World Intellectual Wealth Organisation."
